title: Strongblade Personalized Celtic Dagger with Free Engraving
description: What's better than a dagger that comes with free, personalized engravings? A *Celtic* dagger that comes with free personalized engravings! The Celts were a fierce people of Europe whose fighting skills were matched only by their craftsmanship. This dagger is an inexpensive homage to these proud, artistic people. The dagger is 14.5 inches long, overall, with a 9-inch un-sharpened stainless blade. The guard and pommel are made from pewter, and sculpted into decorative Celtic designs. A red costume jewel lies embedded in the center of the pommel for that special aristocratic touch. The dagger comes with a sheath that bears throat and tip embellishments of gilded pewter. And to truly make this dagger your own, you can add your own engraved message on the blade, for free! That's right, simply add this dagger to your cart and you'll be whisked to Amazon's personalization utility, where you can etch one or two lines onto the blade. These are extremely popular groomsmen's gifts and wedding gifts.
